about.title: Welcome to Bali Zen!
about.intro: Your sanctuary for relaxation and harmony in Ploiești. Our massage studio is dedicated to offering a peaceful refuge, away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

bullets.title: Authentic Balinese experience
bullets.description: Our team of professional therapists from Bali combines experience with passion for healing, offering a range of treatments designed to reduce stress.

bullets.title: Relaxed atmosphere
bullets.description: Every detail is designed for your comfort, from the calm atmosphere to the ancestral techniques that restore your energy and inner harmony.

bullets.title: Therapeutic benefits
bullets.description: At Bali Zen, we believe in the transformative power of massage to improve well-being, reduce stress, and promote overall health.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Discover our complete range of therapeutic massages, each designed to provide you with the relaxation and benefits you need.

subscriptions.title: ZEN 60' Subscription
subscriptions.summary: Enjoy deep relaxation for 3 months, with 60-minute sessions each - a comforting embrace for body and soul.
highlights: Choose any type of 60-minute massage (except anti-cellulite massage)

subscriptions.title: ZEN 90' Subscription
subscriptions.summary: Experience supreme relaxation in 90-minute sessions over 3 months.
highlights: Choose any type of 90-minute massage (except anti-cellulite massage)

subscriptions.title: Anti-Cellulite Subscription
subscriptions.summary: The perfect combination of effective anti-cellulite massage and personalized nutrition.
highlights: Free nutritional assessment with partner nutritionist
Visible results at a special price of 3200 RON

giftCard.title: Give Authentic Relaxation
description: Choose a voucher for a unique massage experience and turn any occasion into a moment of well-being.

Give your loved ones a moment of pure relaxation with a Bali Zen Gift Card. Whether it's an anniversary, a special surprise, or a gesture of appreciation, this gift brings peace, balance, and authentic Balinese indulgence.

features.title: Available in physical and electronic format
features.description: Elegant card, personalized for your special occasion. The electronic card is delivered via WhatsApp.

features.title: Validity: 3 months
features.description: Enough time to schedule the perfect experience.

features.title: Customizable for any occasion
features.description: Anniversaries, special days, or gestures of appreciation.

social.title: Stay connected with us
social.subtitle: Follow Bali Zen on social media for offers, updates, and behind-the-scenes moments.

callToAction.title: Book Your Relaxation Experience
callToAction.subtitle: For quick bookings and additional information, you can contact us by phone or WhatsApp. Our team helps you choose the perfect relaxation experience!

locations.name: Str. Gh Gr Cantacuzino 190 1B, Ploiești
